text: National Lampoon's Class Reunion is a 1982 American horror comedy movie directed by Michael Miller and starring Gerrit Graham, Michael Lerner, Misty Rowe, Blackie Dammett, Fred McCarren, Miriam Flynn, Stephen Furst, Mews Small, Randy Powell, Zane Buzby. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 comedy movies Category:1982 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: National Lampoon's Class Reunion
